titleStmt.title: A vindication of the Roman Catholicks from the foul aspersions thrown upon them by John Tillotson ... in a sermon preached by him in November, 1687 ...
titleStmt.author: Antoine.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John and Thomas Lane ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to M. Antoine. Cf. McAlpin Coll.
